summary.span: 表示带有下拉列表的选择控件，通过单击控件上的箭头可显示或隐藏下拉列表。

span.span: Represents a selection control with a drop-down list that can be shown or hidden by clicking the arrow on the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 允许用户可以从下拉列表中选择的项，或 （可选） 若要在控件的文本框中输入新文本。The allows the user to select an item from a drop-down list or optionally to enter new text in the text box of the control. 是，这意味着它可以包含任何类型 （如字符串、 图像或面板） 的对象的集合。 is an , which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel). 有关更多信息，请参见 类。For more information, see the class. 并属性指定如何用户执行下列任一时的行为：The and properties specify how the behaves when the user does one of the following: - 输入要选择中的项的字符串。Enters a string to select an item in the . - 中的项将进入一个字符串，并不对应。Enters a string that does not correspond to an item in the . - 选择是在文本框中的字符串的一部分。Selects part of the string that is in the text box. - 复制或粘贴到文本框中的一个值。Copies or pastes a value into the text box. 下表描述了用户可以和不能采用，具体取决于的值的操作和。The following table describes the actions the user can and cannot take, depending on the values of and . || 为 `true` is `true`| 为 `false` is `false`| |-|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | 为 `true` is `true`|-不能选择中的项通过在输入字符串。- Cannot select an item in the by entering a string.
-中的项不能输入一个字符串，并不对应。- Cannot enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the .
-可以选择在字符串的一部分文本框。- Can select part of the string in the text box.
-可以将复制中的字符串文字框中，但不能粘贴到字符串文本框。- Can copy the string in the text box, but cannot paste a string into the text box.|-可以选择中的项通过在输入字符串。- Can select an item in the by entering a string.
-可以输入不对应的字符串中的项。- Can enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the .
-可以选择在字符串的一部分文本框。- Can select part of the string in the text box.
-可以复制或粘贴到中的字符串文本框。- Can copy or paste the string in the text box.| | 为 `false` is `false`|-可以选择中的项通过在输入字符串。- Can select an item in the by entering a string.
-中的项不能输入一个字符串，并不对应。- Cannot enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the .
-不能选择中的字符串的一部分。- Cannot select part of the string in the .
-不能复制或粘贴到中的字符串。- Cannot copy or paste the string in the .|-可以选择中的项通过在输入字符串。- Can select an item in the by entering a string.
-中的项不能输入一个字符串，并不对应。- Cannot enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the .
-不能选择中的字符串的一部分。- Cannot select part of the string in the .
-不能复制或粘贴到中的字符串。- Cannot copy or paste the string in the .| 属性的效果才是`true`。The property has an effect only if is `true`. 是，因此它可以显示简单的字符串以外的内容。The is an , so it can display content other than simple strings. 例如，可以创建包含映像的列表。For example, you can create a that contains a list of images. 中的字符串以外的内容后，无意义的字符串中可能会显示时隐藏下拉列表。When you have content other than strings in the , a nonsensical string might appear in the when the drop-down list is hidden. 若要显示的字符串时它包含非字符串项，使用或附加属性。To display a string in the when it contains non-string items, use the or attached property. ## 自定义组合框控件Customizing the ComboBox Control 若要将相同的属性设置应用到多个控件，使用属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 可以修改默认为控件提供唯一外观。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建的详细信息，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的部件和状态的特定于，请参阅[ComboBox 样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/combobox-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [ComboBox Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/combobox-styles-and-templates.md). 该控件的依赖关系属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果属性设置为默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值时该控件将出现在应用程序中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 桌面主题使用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > Visual 属性设置才会影响该属性是否都存在于控件的默认模板，并使用设置。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in control's default template and is set by using a . 可以在中的"更改可视结构控制"部分中找到的视觉对象属性列表[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## Examples 下面的示例创建。The following example creates a . 示例填充通过将绑定类型的集合对象的属性`VacationSpots`。The example populates the by binding the property to a collection object of type `VacationSpots`. 此示例还创建，它显示选定的项的。The example also creates a that displays the selected item of the . [!code-xaml[ComboBoxItems#ComboBoxClass](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ComboBoxItems/CSharp/Window1.xaml#comboboxclass)] 下面的示例定义的集合对象的在前面的示例将绑定到。The following example defines the collection object that the in the preceding example binds to. [!code-csharp[ComboBoxItems#Data](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ComboBoxItems/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#data)] [!code-vb[ComboBoxItems#Data](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ComboBoxItems/VIsualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#data)]

remarks.format:
## Remarks 并属性指定如何用户执行下列任一时的行为：The and properties specify how the behaves when the user does one of the following: - 输入要选择中的项的字符串。Enters a string to select an item in the . - 中的项将进入一个字符串，并不对应。Enters a string that does not correspond to an item in the . - 选择是在文本框中的字符串的一部分。Selects part of the string that is in the text box. - 复制或粘贴到文本框中的一个值。Copies or pastes a value into the text box. 下表描述了用户可以和不能采用，具体取决于的值的操作和。The following table describes the actions the user can and cannot take, depending on the values of and . || 为 `true` is `true`| 为 `false` is `false`| |-|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | 为 `true` is `true`|-不能选择中的项通过在输入字符串。- Cannot select an item in the by entering a string.
-中的项不能输入一个字符串，并不对应。- Cannot enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the .
-可以选择在字符串的一部分文本框。- Can select part of the string in the text box.
-可以将复制中的字符串文字框中，但不能粘贴到字符串文本框。- Can copy the string in the text box, but cannot paste a string into the text box.|-可以选择中的项通过在输入字符串。- Can select an item in the by entering a string.
-可以输入不对应的字符串中的项。- Can enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the .
-可以选择在字符串的一部分文本框。- Can select part of the string in the text box.
-可以复制或粘贴到中的字符串文本框。- Can copy or paste the string in the text box.| | 为 `false` is `false`|-可以选择中的项通过在输入字符串。- Can select an item in the by entering a string.
-中的项不能输入一个字符串，并不对应。- Cannot enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the .
-不能选择中的字符串的一部分。- Cannot select part of the string in the .
-不能复制或粘贴到中的字符串。- Cannot copy or paste the string in the .|-可以选择中的项通过在输入字符串。- Can select an item in the by entering a string.
-中的项不能输入一个字符串，并不对应。- Cannot enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the .
-不能选择中的字符串的一部分。- Cannot select part of the string in the .
-不能复制或粘贴到中的字符串。- Cannot copy or paste the string in the .| 时等同于`false`，则使用以显示当前选定项; 当等于`true`、改为使用为此目的。When is equal to `false`, the uses a to display the currently selected item; when is equal to `true`, a is used for this purpose instead. 请注意，仅显示纯文本，而可能包含纯文本内容，如图像。Note that a only displays plain text, and that a may include non-plain text content, such as images. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例创建作为项而不是文本包含图像的控件。The following examples create controls that contain images as items instead of text. 如果属性设置为`true`，则显示的图像返回的值方法。If the property is set to `true`, the displays the value returned by the image's method. 若要避免意外的文本，通过使用和属性以指定要显示的文本。To avoid a with unexpected text, use the and properties to assign text to be displayed. [!code-xaml[ComboBoxProps_snip#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ComboBoxProps_snip/CS/pane1.xaml#1)] [!code-xaml[ComboBoxProps_snip#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ComboBoxProps_snip/CS/pane1.xaml#2)] 另一种解决方案是使用属性。Another solution is to use the property. 下拉列表控件将不会显示图像，但将显示您分配的文本。The drop-down control of the will not display the images but will display the text you assigned. 下面的示例说明如何使用 。The following example shows how to use . [!code-xaml[ComboBoxProps_snip#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ComboBoxProps_snip/CS/pane1.xaml#3)]

summary.span: 确定是否突出显示 。

span.span: Gets whether the is highlighted.

value.span: 如果突出显示 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the is highlighted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是依赖项属性。This property is a dependency property. 但是，依赖项属性标识符字段不是公共的。However, the dependency property identifier field for is not public. 因此，无法使用支持依赖项属性的属性系统操作需要依赖项属性标识符，例如对调用。Therefore, you cannot use the backing dependency property for property system operations that require the dependency property identifier, such as calls to . 但是，仍可以使用为属性触发器。However, you can still use as a property trigger.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double MaxDropDownHeight { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.MaxDropDownHeight : double with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置组合框下拉部分的最大高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum height for a combo box drop-down.

value.span: 一个 double 值，该值表示检索到的高度或要设置的高度。

span.span: A double that represents the height that is retrieved or the height to set.

value.span: 为属性系统定义的默认值是根据系统最大屏幕高度参数的三分之一计算得到的，但是此默认值可能会由各种控件模板重写。

span.span: The default value as defined to the property system is a calculated value based on taking a one-third fraction of the system max screen height parameters, but this default is potentially overridden by various control templates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自动调整大小不是默认值，并会在下拉列表可能会超出在父元素中的可用大小的大小。Auto sizing is not the default, and will result in the drop down size potentially exceeding the available size in the parent element. 这不是通常所需的。This is not typically desirable. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShouldPreserveUserEnteredPrefix { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ShouldPreserveUserEnteredPrefix : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置指示 是保留用户的输入还是将输入替换为匹配的项的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the keeps the user's input or replaces the input with a matching item.

value.span: 如果 保留用户的输入，则为 ；如果 替换具有匹配项的输入。则为 。注册的默认值是 。

span.span: if the keeps the user's input; if the replaces the input with a matching item The registered default is .

value.span: 有关什么可以影响值的详细信息，请参阅[依赖属性值优先级](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。

span.span: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，当用户键入一个字符串转换相匹配的一个项，则选择该项并替换为用户键入的文本。By default, when the user types a string into the that matches one of its items, the item is selected and the text that the user typed is replaced. 这会导致用户输入来更改大小写的文本。This can cause the text that the user entered to change case. 如果属性设置为`true`，则选择匹配项，但会保留用户输入的文本。If the property is set to `true`, the selects the matching item, but preserves the text that the user entered. 例如，假设包含字符串"Hello"（带有大写字母 H） 和用户输入"你好"（用小写 h)。For example, suppose that a contains the string, "Hello" (with a capital H) and the user enters "hello" (with a lowercase h). 如果是`false`，则选择其集合中的匹配项，"Hello，"，并填充其与该字符串的文本框。If is `false`, the selects the matching item, "Hello," in its collection and populates its text box with that string. 如果是`true`、 从集合中，选择"Hello"，但在文本框中说"你好"。If is `true`, "Hello" is selected from the collection, but the text box says "hello." ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

Public Shared ReadOnly ShouldPreserveUserEnteredPrefixProperty As DependencyProperty

value.span: 默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用属性创建一个组合框的下拉列表控件保持打开状态时用户在文本框中输入信息。This example shows how to use the property to create a combo box whose drop-down control stays open while the user enters information into the text box. summary.span: 获取或设置当前选定项的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text of the currently selected item.

value.span: 当前选定项的字符串。

span.span: The string of the currently selected item.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性是`true`，设置此属性将放置在文本框中输入的初始文本。When the property is `true`, setting this property places initial text entered in the text box. 当是`false`，设置此值不起作用。When is `false`, setting this value has no effect. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , | ## Examples 此示例演示如何属性可以用于设置文本用户进行了选择之前。This example shows how the property can be used to set text into the before the user makes a selection.
